data.title: 18 Synonyms & Antonyms for COMBAT AREA
data.meta_description: Find 18 different ways to say COMBAT AREA, along with antonyms, related words, and example sentences at Thesaurus.com.
data.text:
On this page you'll find 21 synonyms, antonyms, and words related to combat area, such as: battlefront, battle zone, communications zone, firing line, theater, and theater of operations.
